Subject: Re: divorce and homeschooling

Brooke,

Try singlehomeschoolers@yahoogroups.com

--Christy


> Date: Thu, 01 Nov 2001 02:49:49 -0800
> From: Campbell <wegirls@...>
> Subject: divorce and homeschooling
>
> Hi all,
> I have looked high and low but I cannot find a chat group for
> homeschoolers
> who are surviving separation or divorce. Is there such a thing?
> I have a few dear internet friends who are emailing me but I would
> still
> like a "family" of support for the middle of the night type of
> correspondence... and to address my immediate concerns about the
> access.
> My concerns are specific and cannot be addressed in this forum as
> there
> are few that they would apply to.
> Has anyone seen a chat group of this type or have any suggestions?
> I really need help on this.
>
> Thanks,
> Brooke
> under seige but surviving
>
>
> wegirls@...
>
